languages.text: {n}В силуэте ксеноса и его дерганных движениях сквозит нечто фундаментально неправильное, отдающееся в вашем сознании приглушенным отвращением. Каждая из механических конечностей-инструментов будто нарочно выполнена в самой омерзительной и пугающей манере.{/n}

{n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В силуэте ксеноса и его дерганных движениях сквозит нечто фундаментально неправильное, отдающееся в вашем сознании приглушенным отвращением. Каждая из механических конечностей-инструментов будто нарочно выполнена в самой омерзительной и пугающей манере.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong in the xenos's silhouette and twitchy, abrupt movements, something that makes your mind reel in disgust. Each one of his mechanical tool appendages looks like it was purposefully created in the most sickening and horrifying fashion.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong in the xenos's silhouette and twitchy, abrupt movements, something that makes your mind reel in disgust. Each one of his mechanical tool appendages looks like it was purposefully created in the most sickening and horrifying fashion.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of his mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of his mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Le corps du xénos, agité de mouvements brusques et saccadés, a quelque chose de fondamentalement anormal, qui provoque en vous une réaction épidermique. Chacun de ses appendices mécaniques semble avoir été conçu pour paraître aussi répugnant qu'effrayant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le corps du xénos, agité de mouvements brusques et saccadés, a quelque chose de fondamentalement anormal, qui provoque en vous une réaction épidermique. Chacun de ses membres mécaniques semble avoir été conçu pour paraître aussi répugnant qu'effrayant.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}这只异形的古怪轮廓，以及它抽搐、突兀的动作仿佛出了故障一样，令你感到厌恶不已。附在他身上的每一件机械工具，似乎都被设计得尽可能地恐怖，令人不寒而栗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只异形的古怪轮廓，以及它抽搐、突兀的动作仿佛出了故障一样，令你感到厌恶不已。附在他身上的每一件机械工具，似乎都被设计得尽可能地恐怖，令人不寒而栗。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Die Silhouette des Xenos und deren ruckelnde, abrupte Bewegungen haben etwas fundamental Unnatürliches an sich, was großen Ekel in dir auslöst. Jede seiner mechanischen Werkzeug-Gliedmaßen scheint so gestaltet worden zu sein, dass sie so widerwärtig und grauenhaft wie möglich aussieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Silhouette des Xenos und deren ruckelnde, abrupte Bewegungen haben etwas fundamental Unnatürliches an sich, was großen Ekel in dir auslöst. Jede seiner mechanischen Werkzeug-Gliedmaßen scheint so gestaltet worden zu sein, dass sie so widerwärtig und grauenhaft wie möglich aussieht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Hay aspectos fundamentales que no encajan en la silueta de este xenos y sus nerviosos y bruscos movimientos, hecho que provoca una profunda repugnancia en tu mente. Los instrumentos mecánicos de sus apéndices parecen haberse diseñado para ser todo lo repulsivos y espantosos posible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silueta de este xenos y sus nerviosos y bruscos movimientos son indudablemente impropios y te perturban por completo la mente. Los instrumentos mecánicos de sus apéndices parecen haberse diseñado para ser todo lo repulsivos y espantosos posible.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}異種族のシルエットとそのピクピクした不規則な動きは根本的に何かが普通でなく、嫌悪感で心が揺さぶられる。彼の機械的な道具の付属品のひとつひとつは、可能な限り気持ち悪く、おぞましくなるよう設計されているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族のシルエットとそのピクピクした不規則な動きは根本的に何かが普通でなく、嫌悪感で心が揺さぶられる。彼の機械的な道具の付属品のひとつひとつは、可能な限り気持ち悪く、おぞましくなるよう設計されているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Bu zenonun silüeti ile seğiren, ani hareketlerinde temelden yanlış bir şeyler var. Bu durum, zihnini tiksintiyle dolduruyor. Mekanik gereçlerle dolu uzuvlarının her biri, mümkün olan en mide bulandırıcı ve dehşet verici şekillerde tasarlanmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something fundamentally wrong with the xenos's silhouette and its twitchy, abrupt movements, and it sets your mind reeling in disgust. Each of its mechanical tool appendages seems designed to be as sickening and horrifying as possible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu zenonun silüetinde ve seğiren, ani hareketlerinde en temelden yanlış olan bir şeyler var ve zihnini tiksintiyle dolduruyor. Mekanik gereçlerle dolu uzuvlarının her biri, mümkün olan en mide bulandırıcı ve dehşet verici şekillerde tasarlanmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
